summary: Optimistisch, sociaal en resultaatgericht met een sterke affiniteit voor proces denken en agile projectmanagement, dat ben ik in een notendop. Deze eigenschappen stellen mij in staat om bedrijfsprocessen op verschillende niveaus te analyseren, waardevolle gebruikerswensen te identificeren en deze samen met mensen uit verschillende disciplines te vertalen naar waardevolle oplossingen. Mijn grote verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel en sterke overtuiging dat sociale interactie op de werkvloer bepalend is voor de mate van succes van een organisatie, zorgen dat ik altijd hoogwaardige kwaliteit lever zonder hierbij het menselijk aspect van de organisatie uit het oog te verliezen. Samenwerking met stakeholders is essentieel. Mijn professionele interesse focust zich primair op procesverbetering en de optimalisatie van organisaties door technologie en human capacity in lijn te brengen met de business strategie en die van de hele bedrijfsketen: van zand tot klant.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

profile_positions.description: IRIS is een nieuwe applicatie waarmee we Schiphol en haar ketenpartners in staat stellen om o.a. operationele knelpunten en capaciteitsvraagstukken te voorspellen, zodat daar op de juiste plek de juiste maatregel kan worden getroffen. Door verschillende scenario's te simuleren krijgen betrokken partijen in onze luchtvaart operatie inzichten in de status van de operatie van morgen en verder, waarmee kan worden ingespeeld op veranderingen in de dynamiek die Schiphol rijk is. Met Iris zetten we een grote stap richting Total Airport Management.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner Airport Operations Plan (Iris)

profile_positions.description: As Product Owner I am responsible for the development of the Service Management application Schiphol Group uses to support their ITIL processes. In close collaboration with business stakeholders, I help improving business processes and look for new opportunities for innovation. Together with a team of about 10 developers, we translate functional requirements from the business into practical, high end solutions by which we enable Schiphol Group to reach its goals and ensure that the day-to-day operation runs as smoothly as possible.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.location: Schiphol, Schiphol-Oost, Schiphol-Skypark, Provincie Noord-Holland, Nederland
profile_positions.description: The board of Young Schiphol is responsible for organizing both industry relevant and fun events and activities for its members so they get to know colleagues from other departments and become part of the Schiphol network. By doing so, Young Schiphol members gain insights in the to day operation of Schiphol, other then their own field of expertise, thereby developing a strong sense of belonging at the airport and improving their overall working experience at the airport.
profile_positions.title: Board Member of Young Schiphol

profile_positions.description: As Functional Application Manager I am responsible for incrementally improving IBM systems used for Asset Management at Amsterdam Schiphol Airport. This job focuses on defining system requirements, translating these requirements into an improved system design and implementing these improvements so all involved stakeholders can use these applications to the fullest.
profile_positions.title: Functional Application Manager

profile_positions.description: As a Business Consultant I advice and support companies, primarily in the sectors of IT, health care and insurance on how to design, optimize and control their processes by configuring their IT solutions effectively and efficiently. This involves the analysis and design of process improvements, help implementing these improvements in the clients IT environment and providing support before, during and after process changes. To this end I focus on the implementation of Exact software and tailor-made solutions.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Business Solutions

profile_positions.description: As a junior consultant I advice and support companies, primarily in the sectors of IT, health care and insurance on how to design, optimize and control their processes by configuring their IT solutions effectively and efficiently. This involves supporting the implementation of process improvements in the clients IT environment and providing support and training before, during and after process changes. To this end I focus on the implementation of Exact software and tailor-made solutions.
profile_positions.title: Junior Consultant Business Solutions

profile_positions.company: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)
profile_positions.description: Providing training for Bachelor students in the areas of Process Management, Supply Chain Management and Project Management / Organization and coordination of supportive activities such as business excursions, time tables, meetings and evaluation sessions as well as the coordination of the daily operatoin of a team of 15 lecturers.
profile_positions.title: Team Coordinator / Lecturer in Logistics, Process Optimization and Project Management

profile_positions.company: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)
profile_positions.description: Providing training for Bachelor students in the areas of Process Management and Supply Chain Management / Organization of supporting activities for a team of 15 lecturers, such as time tables, meetings, evaluation sessions and coordination of daily activities of the team / Attending a master in Project Management.
profile_positions.title: Lecturer Trainee in Logistics and Process Optimization

profile_positions.description:
Graduation project concerning the optimization of the materiel management process within the entire supply chain of the Dutch military organization with the primary goal to minimize both process lead times and backlog.

DMKC is a maintenance and calibrationfacility of the Dutch Ministry of Defence.
profile_positions.title: Junior Process Consultant (graduate student)

profile_positions.description:
Project concerning the optimization of the repair and maintenance process of Ground Support Equipment (GSE) by improving productivity in the workshop to improve response time and the competitive advantage in tender phases.

TCR Nederland BV. is a workshop for all kinds of GSE needed on the platform of Amsterdam Schiphol Airport.
profile_positions.title: Junior Process Consultant (internship)

profile_positions.description: Operator in electro technical engineering. Concerns the installation of electro technical installations and equipment in housing, utility and industrial environments.
profile_positions.title: Electro Technical Engineer

volunteer_experiences.description: In my role as treasurer at Owners Association Woerden Centraal, I am responsible for the financial registration and reporting (annual reports, yearly budgets) of all the activities required to maintain the shared property of a newly built district in the city of Woerden
